intro: Pellionia hoelscheriana, commonly known as the velvetleaf pellionia, is a species of flowering plant in the family Urticaceae. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its heart-shaped, velvety leaves that are dark green in color. It produces small, inconspicuous flowers that are usually green or white. Pellionia hoelscheriana is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its attractive foliage.
